item.title: Precedence of properties
item.description: Proper Properties When starting with Spark jobs, one of the most common tasks is to understand how to finetune properties.

item.title: Apache Spark: Introduction to project Tungsten
item.description: Introduction Project Tungsten is available from Spark 1.4, Spark 2.x comes with the second generation of the Tungsten engine.

item.title: Introduction to Machine Data
item.description: What is Machine Data With the rise of cheap storage and processing, we are in a better position to extract and process any type of data that can help with insights.
